code: import{ADD_FAV,REMOVE_FAV,FILTER,ORDER}from'./types';export var addFav=function addFav(personaje){return{type:ADD_FAV,payload:personaje};};export var removeFav=function removeFav(id){return{type:REMOVE_FAV,payload:id};};export var filter=function filter(gender){return{type:FILTER,payload:gender};};export var order=function order(_order){return{type:ORDER,payload:_order};};
